procedure.name: Dental Implant Placement
procedure.description: Surgical placement of one or more dental implants and related procedures.

recommended_treatment.details: Dental implant placement and any additional procedures deemed necessary during treatment.

treatment_alternatives.description: Alternative treatment options have been explained to the patient.

risks_and_complications: Drug reactions and medication side effects
Post-operative pain, bleeding, infection, swelling, or delayed healing
Damage to adjacent teeth or restorations
Sinus cavity involvement requiring additional treatment or repair
Nerve injury resulting in temporary or permanent numbness, pain, or altered sensation
Inability to place implant due to anatomy
Unacceptable cosmetic outcome or gum discoloration
Bone loss around implant or adjacent teeth
Temporary or permanent anesthesia-related numbness or muscle tenderness

authorization_scope.description: Authorization for implant placement and necessary additional procedures.
